attributes.action: Allow tennis (singles/within a household) outdoors during the November lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
Physical and mental well-being are critical to the population during the next 4 weeks. Understandably restrictions have to be put in place to safeguard against exponential growth in Covid-9, however a blanket approach to ban ALL sport during this time leaves few options to keep active. 
Tennis, played outdoors (singles/within a household), has obvious physical benefits (as well as the emotional benefits of being active) and is a perfect option for safe, socially distanced exercise..
Please sign
attributes.background: To allow tennis to to be played outdoors, following new guidelines (ie within a household or with one other person) during the November lockdown.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow indoor/outdoor tennis courts to operate under strict distancing protocols: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557428

Exempt outdoor tennis from closure due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557658
